wikipedia_page.main: William Stanley Furr (22 July 1891 – 1975) was an English professional footballer who played as an outside right in the Football League for Leicester Fosse.

response: Grimes was married to Ameila Furr, sister of the footballing brothers George, Harry, Vic and Willie Furr.
Payne was married to Miriam, sister of Hitchin-born footballing brothers George, Harry, Vic and Willie Furr. He was seriously wounded on active service during the First World War.
